blog.title: emma
blog.description: i love a lot of things, but mainly andi mack (she/her)

summary: Thoughts on “The Quacks” 3x10
body:
Thoughts on “The Quacks” 3x10

(i wasn’t able to watch this episode as early as usual because i had stuff to do and i accidentally saw a brief spoiler but i’m so hyped and ready!!)

  • i’m glad they all agreed the cult thing was creepy
  • but i agree i feel a lil bad for him
  • he made her shoes did that make her think of marty too ?¿? hmmMmm
  • cyrus is right TELL HIM BUFFY
  • “how can he not know?” “he’s a guy” GENIUS FACTS FROM JONAH BECK
  • cyrus’s dancing looks like those inflatable noodle men from gas stations
  • AMBER
  • oh my god cyrus assuming she doesn’t want him to talk about himself is telling
  • glad he stood up for himself even though he misinterpreted it
  • CYRUS AND AMBER FRIENDSHIP 2019
  • i love her digs at him
  • the surprise should’ve been a puppy
  • andi quinn is not as cool as andi mack soz
  • let bex keep her last name!
  • the quacks is funny but also hyphens are a thing guys
  • i can’t touch my toes either i’m telling you i am cyrus
  • this comedic duo is so good
  • i love amber showing off
  • whoever this coach is i stan her
  • buffy i love you but you gotta work on your morale
  • andi and libby laughing together thank you
  • jonah is RIGHT THERE
  • well that was awkward
  • i like this basketball girl who’s calling out buffy she seems cool
  • ohhh andi is a substitute player that makes a lot more sense
  • cyrus learned sign language of course he did
  • jonah i know it’s scary but you gotta put in some more effort
  • cyrus the therapist™️ returns
  • thanks for talking sense into him cy
  • newlywed game??? ok
  • ooooo these questions are SAUCY
  • poor andi and poor buffy and poor unnamed basketball girl who’s sorry :(
  • yes buffy give your encouraging speech!!
  • this is such a cute speech buffy is so good at this!!
  • ANDI GOT A BASKET AWWW
  • this team is my new favorite girl gang
  • bex and bowie are still cute glad that’s cleared up
  • awwww libby is gonna teach jonah sign language this is really cute
  • she grabbed his hand so i ship another straight couple???
  • amber is such a worried mom watching cyrus and dancing along
  • honestly? cyrus is enjoying himself and that’s all i ask for
  • OH MY GOD BOWIE IS GONNA TAKE BEX’S NAME
  • this is ICONIC screw societal norms take the wife’s name!!
  • is buffy calling walker? or marty?
  • IT WAS MARTY HELL YEAH BOYS
  • AHHHHHHH MARTY FROM THE PARTY IS BACK BABY

Promo Time

  • buffy looks cute
  • it’s like chinese new year but with a shiva
  • oh my god another panic attack oh my god
  • obviously i don’t want jonah to have them but i’m glad they didn’t just drop the plot

this episode was so much better than the last one and next weeks is gonna be so good i am so happy i cannot wait!!!!!

summary:
What really upsets me about the circumstances of the Wuffy breakup/Walker characterization:
The writers didn’t need to make him...
body:
What really upsets me about the circumstances of the Wuffy breakup/Walker characterization:

The writers didn’t need to make him out to be some weird “player” type guy with a “signature move” (ie the shoes)

When asked why Buffy wasn’t into him anymore, it could’ve been A) she realized they weren’t compatible and/or B) she simply didn’t like him/want to date him anymore! You need any further explanation than that!

Vilifying Walker (even in a casual, lighthearted kinda way) seemed to only serve as opportunity for Buffy and Andi to bond. And of course, it seems like Buffy has had some feelings for Marty all along, but we see in the promo that she’s going to hide that from Andi… so we will get another fracture in the Buffy/Andi relationship. And for what??

Idk my dudes…. the show has been so great with certain storylines, but I feel like the relationship/friendship storylines are a mess.

Walker deserved better because he was a great, charismatic character, but I’m further upset that Andi Mack is all about diversity and yet they squander the potential of their only male POC on the show.

What really upsets me about the circumstances of the Wuffy breakup/Walker characterization:

When asked why Buffy wasn’t into him anymore, it could’ve been A) she realized they weren’t compatible and/or B) she simply didn’t like him/want to date him anymore! You need any further explanation than that!

Vilifying Walker (even in a casual, lighthearted kinda way) seemed to only serve as opportunity for Buffy and Andi to bond. And of course, it seems like Buffy has had some feelings for Marty all along, but we see in the promo that she’s going to hide that from Andi… so we will get another fracture in the Buffy/Andi relationship. And for what??

Idk my dudes…. the show has been so great with certain storylines, but I feel like the relationship/friendship storylines are a mess.

Walker deserved better because he was a great, charismatic character, but I’m further upset that Andi Mack is all about diversity and yet they squander the potential of their only male POC on the show.

summary: Do you know when the extended promos usually come out?
question: Do you know when the extended promos usually come out?
answer: I think they usually air within the first 10 minutes or so after the episode finishes on airing on Disney Channel, so it’ll air on TV some time between like 8:30 and 8:45 est tonight, and it usually doesn’t take someone long to post it online after that so.

reblog.comment: I think they usually air within the first 10 minutes or so after the episode finishes on airing on Disney Channel, so it’ll air on TV some time between like 8:30 and 8:45 est tonight, and it usually doesn’t take someone long to post it online after that so.
